# fuimus

> **fuimus** /ˈfu.i.mus/, [ˈfuɪmʊs̠]: literally, "we have been" in Latin. Often interpreted as "We have endured" or "We have always been", proclaiming the long history of the user. Can often be seen as a family motto (e.g., the Lowlands Scottish [Clan Bruce](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clan_Bruce)).

You can install **fuimus** from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r

```
